short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the nearest whatever to your address or any address

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension that gives you a map location of anything you want to search for near any address. 

1. Put in your address (can NOT use just zip codes!!) 

2. Put in your search information such as ie.. Walmart, McDonalds, Taco Bell, etc..

3. Click the big Yellow button "Show Me What Is Near"

Pro Version release is on the horizon. The Pro version will cost $19.97.
